name: Water Blaster Firefighter
description:
A game for the GMTK 2020 gamejam - Out of control. Its a game where a fire fighter named Chase, equipped with a pressurized hose, goes into a burning house, (where the fire is, as to the theme out of control) to attempt to save the people inside. I did all of the coding in gamemaker studio, most of the spritework in pyxel edit, and some in gamemaker's built in pixel editor. I made the sound effects in https://www.bfxr.net/, and got the music from Rolemusic on https://freemusicarchive.org/

Controls - wasd, space to jump, and mouse to point, click to send out a "burst" of water. Or on a controller, left bumper will make you jump, right will make you send out your burst, walk with the left stick, and point with the right stick. You will have to press start or one of the bumpers to switch to a controller.
